title: 'Shithole Countries' Comment
summary: During Oval Office meeting, Trump asked 'Why are we having all these people from shithole countries come here?' referring to Haiti, El Salvador, and African nations.
keyFacts: Asked 'Why are we having all these people from shithole countries come here?'
Referred to Haiti, El Salvador, and African nations
Made during immigration policy meeting with senators
Multiple senators present confirmed the comment
Widely condemned as racist by Democrats and some Republicans
Sparked international outrage and formal protests from affected countries
